title: Unable to post on PBE community and EXP boost Error
body:
I did logged in with my PBE account but it just keep saying i must be Lv.1 or higher to post yet i am LV31.

If any Rioter can see this i just wanna ask why am i getting Less EXP after purchasing 100 win EXP boost and 7 days EXP boost?

Before i purchased The EXP boost i get 800 - 1200 and after i purchased the EXP boost i get  around 200 exp per game (Bot games, Normal games and Boom Bot)

replies.body: Sometimes you just need a quick profile sync to get your Boards and Summoner level linked up with each other. Unfortunately, I don't have any info on how those exp boosts work past level 30, but I'm sure someone on the [**PBE Boards**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback) has that answer. I went ahead and synced your account on my end, so try posting this over in PBE again.
